inline int add(int a,int b, int m=INF){a+=b;if(a>=m)a-=m;return a;}
inline int mul(int a,int b, int m=INF){return (int)(((ll)a*(ll)b)%m);}
inline int norm(int x,int m=INF){if(x>=m)x%=m;if(x<0)x+=m;return x;}
inline int neg(int x,int m=INF){x=-x;return norm(x);}

#define maxn 461
int dp[maxn][maxn][maxn];
string a,b,c;
int n;
int f(int i,int j,int k)
{
	if(i < 0 || j< 0 || k < 0)return -INF;
	if(i==0 || j==0 || k==0)return 0;
	if(dp[i][j][k] != -1)return dp[i][j][k];
	int &ans=dp[i][j][k];
	ans=0;
	if(a[i-1] == b[j-1] && a[i-1] == c[k-1])ans=1+f(i-1,j-1,k-1);
	else if(a[i-1]==b[j-1])ans=max(f(i,j,k-1),f(i-1,j-1,k));
	else if(a[i-1] == c[k-1])ans=max(f(i,j-1,k),f(i-1,j,k-1));
	else if(b[j-1]== c[k-1])ans=max(f(i-1,j,k),f(i,j-1,k-1));
	else 
	{
		ans=max(f(i,j-1,k),max(f(i-1,j,k),f(i,j,k-1)));
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
    boost;
    TCASE
    {
    	cin>>a>>b>>c;
    	n=a.size();
		C(dp,-1);
    	int x=f(n,n,n);
    	cout<<3*(n-x)<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
